reference.title: cxxClassDefinitionFileLineEnd
reference.shortdesc: The <cxxClassDefinitionFileLineEnd> element specifies the end of the class definition.

section.title: Description
section.p: The <cxxClassDefinitionFileLineEnd> element is defined within <cxxClassAPIItemLocation>. It contains the line number that the class definition ends on. The element is empty but for the required attributes name and value. The attribute name must be set to "lineNumber". The attribute value is set to the line number the class definition ends on.

example.title: Example
example.codeblock: <cxxClassAPIItemLocation> <cxxClassDeclarationFile name="filePath" value="D:/include/headerfile.h"/> <cxxClassDeclarationFileLine name="lineNumber" value="775"/> <cxxClassDefinitionFile name="filePath" value="D:/include/headerfile.h"/> <cxxClassDefinitionFileLineStart name="lineNumber" value="765"/> <cxxClassDefinitionFileLineEnd name="lineNumber" value="787"/> </cxxClassAPIItemLocation>
